articles.author: Chuck Arnold
articles.title: Mickey Guyton: Super Bowl national anthem 'huge moment for black people' - New York Post
articles.description: “I have everybody from my black queen to a redneck cowboy to a girl that has one leg in this choir,” Guyton told The Post. “And that’s the America that I’m proud of.”
articles.content:
As a black female country artist, Mickey Guyton has spent the past year breaking color and gender barriers in the predominantly white male genre.

articles.author: George Ramsay and Patrick Sung, CNN
articles.title: American Erin Jackson wins 500m speed skating gold at Winter Olympics after teammate gave up spot - CNN
articles.description: US speed skater Erin Jackson won the women's 500m gold medal at the Winter Olympics in a time of 37.04 on Sunday.

articles.title: US refuses to confirm reports that suggest Russia is to invade Ukraine on Wednesday - News24
articles.description: Senior US officials on Sunday said they could not confirm reports that US intelligence indicates that Russia is planning to invade Ukraine on Wednesday, but they repeated warnings for Americans to leave Ukraine immediately.

articles.description: Fruits offer much more than just sugar. Increasing fruit intake while decreasing artificial sugar consumption will significantly reduce blood sugar, says an American expert.
